item.title: Assessing the environmental footprint of AI models at Meta
item.description: I was invited by Meta FAIR team to explain how to better account for AI environmental foorprint during the training phase. The objective of this talk was to provide pratical ways to enhance carbon emissions disclosure, such as what Meta already does for its Llama models.
